Montgomery.KIH55: KIH55 (sometimes referred to as Montgomery All Hazards) is a NOAA Weather Radio station that serves the Montgomery Metropolitan Area and surrounding cities. It is programmed from the National Weather Service forecast office in Birmingham, Alabama with its transmitter located in Montgomery. It broadcasts weather and hazard information for the following Counties: Autauga, Bullock, Chilton, Coosa, Dallas, Elmore, Lowndes, Macon, and Montgomery.
